TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CancellationTokenSource extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CancellationTokenSource extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class CancellationTokenSource Implements IDisposable
public ref class CancellationTokenSource sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: 向应该被取消的 发送信号。

span.span: Signals to a that it should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)] ，.NET Framework 使用统一的模型来协作取消涉及两个对象的异步操作或长时间运行的同步操作：Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the .NET Framework uses a unified model for cooperative cancellation of asynchronous or long-running synchronous operations that involves two objects: - 一个 对象，该对象通过其属性提供取消标记 ，并通过调用其或方法发送取消消息 。A object, which provides a cancellation token through its property and sends a cancellation message by calling its or method. - 一个 对象，指示是否请求取消。A object, which indicates whether cancellation is requested. 用于实现协作取消模型的常规模式是：The general pattern for implementing the cooperative cancellation model is: - 实例化 对象，此对象管理取消通知并将其发送给单个取消标记。Instantiate a object, which manages and sends cancellation notification to the individual cancellation tokens. - 将 属性返回的标记传递给每个侦听取消的任务或线程。Pass the token returned by the property to each task or thread that listens for cancellation. - 从接收取消标记的操作中调用方法。Call the method from operations that receive the cancellation token. 为每个任务或线程提供响应取消请求的机制。Provide a mechanism for each task or thread to respond to a cancellation request. 是否选择取消操作以及具体操作方式取决于应用程序逻辑。Whether you choose to cancel an operation, and exactly how you do it, depends on your application logic. - 调用 方法以提供取消通知。Call the method to provide notification of cancellation. 这会将 取消标记的每个副本上的属性设置为 `true` 。This sets the property on every copy of the cancellation token to `true`. - 当你完成对象时，调用方法 。Call the method when you are finished with the object. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管线程中的取消](/dotnet/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads)。For more information, see [Cancellation in Managed Threads](/dotnet/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现 接口。This type implements the interface. 使用完该类型的实例后，应直接或间接释放该实例。When you have finished using an instance of the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，请在 `try`/`catch` 块中调用其 方法。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下面的示例使用随机数生成器来模拟数据收集应用程序，该应用程序从第11个不同乐器读取10个整数值。The following example uses a random number generator to emulate a data collection application that reads 10 integral values from eleven different instruments. 如果值为零，则指示度量值对一个检测失败，在这种情况下，应取消该操作，而不应计算整体平均值。A value of zero indicates that the measurement has failed for one instrument, in which case the operation should be cancelled and no overall mean should be computed. 为了处理可能取消的操作，此示例实例化一个 对象，该对象生成一个传递给对象的取消标记 。To handle the possible cancellation of the operation, the example instantiates a object that generates a cancellation token which is passed to a object. 对象反过来将取消标记传递给负责收集特定检测的读取的每个任务。The object in turn passes the cancellation token to each of the tasks responsible for collecting readings for a particular instrument. 调用方法以确保仅在成功收集所有读数后计算平均值。The method is called to ensure that the mean is computed only after all readings have been gathered successfully. 如果任务未被取消，则调用 方法将引发异常。If a task has not because it has been cancelled, the call to the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/cs/cancel1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/vb/cancel1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 的所有公共和受保护的成员 都是线程安全的，并且可以从多个线程并发使用，但除外 ，只能在对象上的所有其他操作 都完成时使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of , which must only be used when all other operations on the object have completed.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that will be canceled after the specified delay in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在对 `millisecondsDelay` 构造函数的调用过程中开始的倒计时。The countdown for the `millisecondsDelay` starts during the call to the constructor. 当 `millisecondsDelay` 过期时，将 取消构造 (如果尚未取消) 。When the `millisecondsDelay` expires, the constructed is canceled (if it has not been canceled already). 如果尚未取消，对的后续调用 将重置 `millisecondsDelay` 构造的 。Subsequent calls to will reset the `millisecondsDelay` for the constructed , if it has not been canceled already.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对构造函数的调用过程中延迟的倒计时开始。The countdown for the delay starts during the call to the constructor. 延迟过期后， 如果尚未取消构造，则会取消构造。When the delay expires, the constructed is canceled, if it has not been canceled already. 如果尚未取消，对的后续调用将重置构造的延迟 。Subsequent calls to will reset the delay for the constructed , if it has not been canceled already.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Cancel() cil managed

summary.span: 传达取消请求。

span.span: Communicates a request for cancellation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相关的 将会收到取消通知，并将转换为状态， 返回 true。The associated will be notified of the cancellation and will transition to a state where returns true. 将执行向注册的任何回调或可取消操作 。Any callbacks or cancelable operations registered with the will be executed. 建议向注册的可取消操作和回调 不会引发异常。We recommend that cancelable operations and callbacks registered with not throw exceptions. 此 Cancel 重载将聚合引发到中的所有异常 ，以便引发异常的一个回调不会阻止执行其他已注册的回调。This overload of Cancel will aggregate any exceptions thrown into an , such that one callback throwing an exception will not prevent other registered callbacks from being executed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用随机数生成器来模拟数据收集应用程序，该应用程序从第11个不同乐器读取10个整数值。The following example uses a random number generator to emulate a data collection application that reads 10 integral values from eleven different instruments. 如果值为零，则指示度量值对一个检测失败，在这种情况下，应取消该操作，而不应计算整体平均值。A value of zero indicates that the measurement has failed for one instrument, in which case the operation should be cancelled and no overall mean should be computed. 为了处理可能取消的操作，此示例实例化一个 对象，该对象生成一个传递给对象的取消标记 。To handle the possible cancellation of the operation, the example instantiates a object that generates a cancellation token which is passed to a object. 对象反过来将取消标记传递给负责收集特定检测的读取的每个任务。The object in turn passes the cancellation token to each of the tasks responsible for collecting readings for a particular instrument. 调用方法以确保仅在成功收集所有读数后计算平均值。The method is called to ensure that the mean is computed only after all readings have been gathered successfully. 如果任务未被取消，则调用 方法将引发异常。If a task has not because it has been cancelled, the call to the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/cs/cancel1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/vb/cancel1.vb#1)]

param.span: 如果异常应立即传播，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if exceptions should immediately propagate; otherwise, .

summary.span: 如果出现异常，传达取消请求，并指定是否应处理其余回调和可取消操作。

span.span: Communicates a request for cancellation, and specifies whether remaining callbacks and cancelable operations should be processed if an exception occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相关的 将会收到取消通知，并将转换为返回的状态 `true` 。The associated will be notified of the cancellation and will transition to a state where returns `true`. 将执行向注册的任何回调或可取消操作 。Any callbacks or cancelable operations registered with the will be executed. 回调会按后进先出的顺序执行。Callbacks will be executed synchronously in LIFO order. 建议向注册的可取消操作和回调 不会引发异常。We recommend that cancelable operations and callbacks registered with not throw exceptions. 如果 `throwOnFirstException` 为 `true` ，则异常将立即传播到对的调用 ，从而阻止处理其余回调和可取消操作。If `throwOnFirstException` is `true`, an exception will immediately propagate out of the call to , preventing the remaining callbacks and cancelable operations from being processed. 如果 `throwOnFirstException` 为 `false` ，则此重载将聚合引发的任何异常 ，以便引发异常的一个回调不会阻止执行其他已注册的回调。If `throwOnFirstException` is `false`, this overload will aggregate any exceptions thrown into an , such that one callback throwing an exception will not prevent other registered callbacks from being executed.

span.span: Schedules a cancel operation on this after the specified number of milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `millisecondsDelay`此调用期间开始的倒计时。The countdown for the `millisecondsDelay` starts during this call. 当 `millisecondsDelay` 过期时， 如果尚未取消，则取消此操作。When the `millisecondsDelay` expires, this is canceled, if it has not been canceled already. 对 CancelAfter 的后续调用将重置 `millisecondsDelay` 此的 ，如果尚未取消。Subsequent calls to CancelAfter will reset the `millisecondsDelay` for this , if it has not been canceled already.

remarks.format:
The countdown for the delay starts during this call. When the delay expires, this <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource> is canceled, if it has not been canceled already.
Subsequent calls to `CancelAfter` will reset the delay for this <xref:System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource>, if it has not been canceled already.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 `Dispose` ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 请注意，调用不 `Dispose` 会将取消请求传递给关联的使用者 。Note that calling `Dispose` does not communicate a request for cancellation to consumers of the associated . 可以通过调用方法（如或）来传达取消请求 。You can communicate a request for cancellation by calling methods such as or . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

summary.span: 获取是否已请求取消此 。

span.span: Gets whether cancellation has been requested for this .

value.span: 如果已请求取消此 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if cancellation has been requested for this ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示是否已请求取消此标记源，例如，因为调用了其 方法。This property indicates whether cancellation has been requested for this token source, such as due to a call to its method. 如果此属性返回 `true` ，则只保证已请求取消。If this property returns `true`, it only guarantees that cancellation has been requested. 它不保证使用相应令牌注册的每个处理程序都已完成执行，也不保证取消请求已完成传播到所有已注册的处理程序。It does not guarantee that every handler registered with the corresponding token has finished executing, nor that cancellation requests have finished propagating to all registered handlers. 可能需要更多的同步，尤其是在同时取消相关对象的情况下。Additional synchronization may be required, particularly in situations where related objects are being canceled concurrently.
